title: Organized Macro-scale Membrane Size Reduction in Vanadium Redox Flow Batteries: Part 2. Flow-field-informed Membrane Coverage Distribution
content:
Energy Adv., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4YA00118D, Paper
Open Access

Bronston Benetho, Abdulmonem Fetyan, Musbaudeen O. Bamgbopa
Membranes are a critical component in flowing-electrolyte electrochemical systems like redox flow batteries (RFB), and as such, they contribute significantly to overall RFB stack cost – which affects technology adoption....
